def trigger_0(input_data=None):
    """
    comments: 手动触发器，用户点击按钮时触发工作流
    TODOs:
      - 实现触发器函数

    """
    params = {}
    function = transparent_trigger(integration="manualTrigger", resource="default", operation="default")
    output_data = function.run(input_data=None, params=params)
    return output_data


def action_0(input_data):
    """
    comments: 配置Slack发送消息动作，发送消息到#general频道，内容为'Hello World!'
    TODOs:
      - 测试消息发送
      - 验证消息是否发送到正确频道
    """
    params = {"select": "channel", "channelId": {"mode": "name", "value": "general"}, "messageType": "text", "text": "=Hello World!"}
    function = transparent_action(integration="slack", resource="message", operation="post")
    output_data = function.run(input_data=input_data, params=params)
    return output_data


def mainWorkflow(trigger_input: [{...}]):
    """
    comments: 主工作流，手动触发后发送消息到Slack的#general频道
    TODOs:
      - 调用手动触发器
      - 调用Slack发送消息动作
      - 返回Slack动作输出
    """
    # 调用手动触发器，触发工作流
    trigger_output = trigger_0()

    # 调用Slack发送消息动作
    slack_output = action_0(trigger_output)

    return slack_output
